DOC.brief_summary: This program carry dedicated outpatient-clinic city Hengelo evaluation treatment subject obesity . The program put emphasis intervention appropriate diet physical exercise , support patient achieve long-term behaviour change . Interventions compare normal vs high protein/low carb diet .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Effects High Protein Diet Obesity , LOWER Study
DOC.detailed_description: Assessment focus effect specific diet weight reduction 3 month , weight maintenance 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Obesity BMI > 27 kg/m2 Recent loss body weight ( > 10 % ) Underlying malignancy , HIV infection , psychiatric disease Pregnancy breast feeding
